fields.description:
*Assessment*

EBS-backed EMI launched with ephemeral and EBS block device mapping fails to establish any network information.

_EBS-backed instance launched_
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-describe-images  emi-beae1914 --region sales-admin@
IMAGE	emi-beae1914	002598321247/ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-ebs-hvm	002598321247	available	private	x86_64	machine				ebs	hvm
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	EBS	/dev/sda	snap-eaa7f814	10	true	standard

[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-run-instances -k sales-admin emi-beae1914 --associate-public-ip=true -t m1.medium -b /dev/sdc=ephemeral0 -b /dev/sdd=:8:true:standard --region sales-admin@

[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-describe-instances  i-b077da38 --region sales-admin@
RESERVATION	r-7dea0d44	002598321247	default
INSTANCE	i-b077da38	emi-beae1914	euca-10-116-155-171.eucalyptus.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-8-164.eucalyptus.internal	runningsales-admin	0		m1.medium	2016-09-30T18:18:58.181Z	ds2				monitoring-disabled	10.116.155.171	172.31.8.164	vpc-8e499bf7	subnet-c64b0975	ebs					hvm			sg-bc1a8442				x86_64
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sdd	vol-cadee9d0	2016-09-30T18:18:59.463Z	true
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sda	vol-ca4379b5	2016-09-30T18:19:00.218Z	true
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-e4b13bf3	subnet-c64b0975	vpc-8e499bf7	002598321247	in-use	172.31.8.164	euca-172-31-8-164.eucalyptus.internal	true
ATTACHMENT		eni-attach-e411b55a	0	attached	2016-09-30T18:18:58.213Z	true
ASSOCIATION	10.116.155.171		172.31.8.164
GROUP	sg-bc1a8442	default
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.8.164	euca-172-31-8-164.eucalyptus.internal	primary
{code}

_Attempt to display instance console output_
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-get-console-output i-b077da38 --region sales-admin@
i-b077da38


[root@g-22-04 ~]#
{code}

_SSH attempt to instance_
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-describe-groups default --region sales-admin@
GROUP	sg-bc1a8442	002598321247	default	default VPC security group	vpc-8e499bf7
PERMISSION	002598321247	default	ALLOWS	-1			FROM	USER	002598321247	NAME	default	ID	sg-bc1a8442	ingress
PERMISSION	002598321247	default	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
PERMISSION	002598321247	default	ALLOWS	-1			TO	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	egress

[root@g-22-04 ~]# ssh -i sales-admin-pk ubuntu@euca-10-116-155-171.eucalyptus.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
ssh: connect to host euca-10-116-155-171.eucalyptus.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com port 22: Connection timed out
{code}

_Instance information on Node Controller_
{code}
[root@h-07 ~]# virsh dumpxml i-b077da38
<domain type='kvm' id='113'>
  <name>i-b077da38</name>
  <uuid>ae0e63bf-8cfc-4f2b-8ae3-295e6c7b5ae6</uuid>
  <description>Eucalyptus instance i-b077da38</description>
  <memory unit='KiB'>524288</memory>
  <currentMemory unit='KiB'>524288</currentMemory>
  <vcpu placement='static'>1</vcpu>
  <resource>
    <partition>/machine</partition>
  </resource>
  <os>
    <type arch='x86_64' machine='pc-i440fx-rhel7.2.0'>hvm</type>
  </os>
  <features>
    <acpi/>
  </features>
  <cpu>
    <topology sockets='1' cores='1' threads='1'/>
  </cpu>
  <clock offset='localtime'/>
  <on_poweroff>destroy</on_poweroff>
  <on_reboot>restart</on_reboot>
  <on_crash>destroy</on_crash>
  <devices>
    <emulator>/usr/libexec/qemu-kvm</emulator>
    <disk type='network' device='disk'>
      <driver name='qemu' type='raw'/>
      <auth username='qauser'>
        <secret type='ceph' uuid='7ae2bacf-86e4-41ec-8ba8-34a80d894920'/>
      </auth>
      <source protocol='rbd' name='eucaqa_vol/vol-ca4379b5'>
        <host name='10.111.5.124' port='6789'/>
        <host name='10.111.5.121' port='6789'/>
        <host name='10.111.5.129' port='6789'/>
      </source>
      <backingStore/>
      <target dev='vda' bus='virtio'/>
      <serial>euca-bdm-ebs1-dev-vda</serial>
      <alias name='virtio-disk0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x03' function='0x0'/>
    </disk>
    <disk type='block' device='disk'>
      <driver name='qemu' type='raw' cache='none'/>
      <source dev='/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDACREWFLDRMN6UV4TPH/i-b077da38/link-to-vdc'/>
      <backingStore/>
      <target dev='vdc' bus='virtio'/>
      <serial>euca-bdm-ephemeral0-dev-vdc</serial>
      <boot order='3'/>
      <alias name='virtio-disk2'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x04' function='0x0'/>
    </disk>
    <disk type='network' device='disk'>
      <driver name='qemu' type='raw'/>
      <auth username='qauser'>
        <secret type='ceph' uuid='7ae2bacf-86e4-41ec-8ba8-34a80d894920'/>
      </auth>
      <source protocol='rbd' name='eucaqa_vol/vol-cadee9d0'>
        <host name='10.111.5.124' port='6789'/>
        <host name='10.111.5.121' port='6789'/>
        <host name='10.111.5.129' port='6789'/>
      </source>
      <backingStore/>
      <target dev='vdd' bus='virtio'/>
      <serial>euca-bdm-ebs2-dev-vdd</serial>
      <alias name='virtio-disk3'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x05' function='0x0'/>
    </disk>
    <controller type='usb' index='0'>
      <alias name='usb'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x01' function='0x2'/>
    </controller>
    <controller type='pci' index='0' model='pci-root'>
      <alias name='pci.0'/>
    </controller>
    <interface type='bridge'>
      <mac address='d0:0d:e4:b1:3b:f3'/>
      <source bridge='br0'/>
      <target dev='vn_i-b077da38'/>
      <model type='virtio'/>
      <alias name='net0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x02' function='0x0'/>
    </interface>
    <serial type='file'>
      <source path='/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDACREWFLDRMN6UV4TPH/i-b077da38/console.log'/>
      <target port='1'/>
      <alias name='serial0'/>
    </serial>
    <console type='file'>
      <source path='/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDACREWFLDRMN6UV4TPH/i-b077da38/console.log'/>
      <target type='serial' port='1'/>
      <alias name='serial0'/>
    </console>
    <memballoon model='virtio'>
      <alias name='balloon0'/>
      <address type='pci' domain='0x0000' bus='0x00' slot='0x06' function='0x0'/>
    </memballoon>
  </devices>
  <seclabel type='dynamic' model='selinux' relabel='yes'>
    <label>system_u:system_r:svirt_t:s0:c332,c954</label>
    <imagelabel>system_u:object_r:svirt_image_t:s0:c332,c954</imagelabel>
  </seclabel>
</domain>

[root@h-07 ~]# virsh domblklist i-b077da38
Target     Source
------------------------------------------------
vda        eucaqa_vol/vol-ca4379b5
vdc        /var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDACREWFLDRMN6UV4TPH/i-b077da38/link-to-vdc
vdd        eucaqa_vol/vol-cadee9d0

[root@h-07 ~]# virsh domiflist i-b077da38
Interface  Type       Source     Model       MAC
-------------------------------------------------------
vn_i-b077da38 bridge     br0        virtio      d0:0d:e4:b1:3b:f3

[root@h-07 ~]# virsh domifaddr i-b077da38
 Name       MAC address          Protocol     Address
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[root@h-07 ~]#

[root@h-07 ~]# virsh dominfo i-b077da38
Id:             113
Name:           i-b077da38
UUID:           ae0e63bf-8cfc-4f2b-8ae3-295e6c7b5ae6
OS Type:        hvm
State:          running
CPU(s):         1
CPU time:       538.5s
Max memory:     524288 KiB
Used memory:    524288 KiB
Persistent:     no
Autostart:      disable
Managed save:   no
Security model: selinux
Security DOI:   0
Security label: system_u:system_r:svirt_t:s0:c332,c954 (permissive)
{code}

*Notes*

This seems to only affect EBS-backed instances that have ephemeral BDM defined at launch.
fields.summary: Booting errors associated with EBS-backed EMI launched with ephemeral BDM

comments.body: EUCA-2169 discusses a fix where boot order element is added.  Looks like this element isn't part of the XML. https://libvirt.org/formatdomain.html#elementsDisks

Did a couple of tests here to help pinpoint the issue.  

# Launch EBS-backed instance with EBS volume BDM created from snapshot of EMI.  Notice the mount point of '/'.  Its using the EBS volume used in the BDM.
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-describe-images emi-beae1914 --region sales-admin@
IMAGE	emi-beae1914	002598321247/ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-ebs-hvm	002598321247	available	private	x86_64	machine				ebs	hvm
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	EBS	/dev/sda	snap-eaa7f814	10	true	standard

[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-run-instances -k sales-admin emi-beae1914 --associate-public-ip=true -t m1.medium -b /dev/sdc=snap-eaa7f814::true:standard --region sales-admin@
RESERVATION	r-0aa94f66	002598321247	default
INSTANCE	i-151ae481	emi-beae1914	euca-10-116-155-30.eucalyptus.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-14-137.eucalyptus.internal	pendingsales-admin	0		m1.medium	2016-10-03T19:57:32.824Z	ds2				monitoring-disabled	10.116.155.30	172.31.14.137	vpc-8e499bf7	subnet-c64b0975	ebs					hvm			sg-bc1a8442				x86_64
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-fe757990	subnet-c64b0975	vpc-8e499bf7	002598321247	in-use	172.31.14.137	euca-172-31-14-137.eucalyptus.internal	true
ATTACHMENT		eni-attach-1da1b0cd	0	attached	2016-10-03T19:57:33.336Z	true
ASSOCIATION	10.116.155.30		172.31.14.137
GROUP	sg-bc1a8442	default
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.14.137	euca-172-31-14-137.eucalyptus.internal	primary
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-151ae481 --region sales-admin@

NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-fe757990	subnet-c64b0975	vpc-8e499bf7	002598321247	in-use	172.31.14.137	euca-172-31-14-137.eucalyptus.internal	true
